who am i?

?

Gregory Collett - born and raised in S.E London, England.

A diligent, hardworking individual ready to take on any challenge, if it includes learning - all the better!

Fell in with tech as a child and it has continued to grow. It all started with my family's electronics & a screwdriver, any electronic item I could get my hands on was dissected.

I then progressed to software, all it took to get me hooked was a Â£3 magazine with a demo disc containing a 30 day trial of Dreamweaver MX and Flash MX (the macromedia days)... I never looked back!
